languages.text: "Ты говоришь о том, что осознать не в силах, элантах. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Путеводные камни{/g} не просто диковинные украшения моего народа. Они — нечто больше..." {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза и неосознанно касается алого кристалла на груди.{/n} "С рождения и до последнего вздоха камень души принадлежит лишь своему хозяину, являясь вечным напоминанием о том, что все мы смертны. Ибо он есть первое пристанище разума и последнее пристанище духа, что так жаждет поглотить {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Ты говоришь о том, что осознать не в силах, элантах. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Путеводные камни{/g} не просто диковинные украшения моего народа. Они — нечто больше..." {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза и неосознанно касается алого кристалла на груди.{/n} "С рождения и до последнего вздоха камень души принадлежит лишь своему хозяину, являясь вечным напоминанием о том, что все мы смертны. Ибо он есть первое пристанище разума и последнее пристанище духа, что так жаждет поглотить {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not mere trinkets worn by my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and her hand inexorably reaches for the red crystal on her breast.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul, which {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} is so eager to devour."
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь о том, что осознать не в силах, элантах. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Путеводные камни{/g} не просто диковинные украшения моего народа. Они — нечто больше..." {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза и неосознанно касается алого кристалла на груди.{/n} "С рождения и до последнего вздоха камень души принадлежит лишь своему хозяину, являясь вечным напоминанием о том, что все мы смертны. Ибо он есть первое пристанище разума и последнее пристанище духа, что так жаждет поглотить {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not just fancy accessories to my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and reaches for the red crystal on her breast with a non-conscious gesture.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul that {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}" is so eager to devour.
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not just fancy accessories to my people. languages.text: “你在谈论你无法理解的东西，外界人。{g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}引路石{/g}并不仅仅是我们佩戴的饰品，而是某种更加伟大的东西……”{n}伊莉耶特闭上了眼睛，她的手下意识地抚摸着胸前的红色水晶。{/n}“从我们出生，到我们咽下最后一口气为止，灵魂石只属于它的主人。它一刻不停地提醒着我们，我们并非永生不死。它是我们心智最初的庇护所，也是我们灵魂最后的庇护所。{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}赛·兰斯雷什{/g}急切地想要吞噬我们的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not mere trinkets worn by my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and her hand inexorably reaches for the red crystal on her breast.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul, which {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} is so eager to devour."

traits.locale_text: “你在谈论你无法理解的东西，外界人。{g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}引路石{/g}并不仅仅是我们佩戴的饰品，而是某种更加伟大的东西……”{n}伊莉耶特闭上了眼睛，她的手下意识地抚摸着胸前的红色水晶。{/n}“从我们出生，到我们咽下最后一口气为止，灵魂石只属于它的主人。它一刻不停地提醒着我们，我们并非永生不死。它是我们心智最初的庇护所，也是我们灵魂最后的庇护所。{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}赛·兰斯雷什{/g}急切地想要吞噬我们的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. Waystones are not mere trinkets worn by my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and her hand inexorably reaches for the red crystal on her breast.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul, which Sai'lanthresh is so eager to devour."

languages.text: «Hablas de algo que no puedes comprender, elantach. Las {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}piedras del alma{/g} no son meros adornos para mi gente. Son mucho más...». {n}Yrliet cierra los ojos y su mano se acerca inexorablemente al cristal rojo de su pecho.{/n} «Desde que nacemos hasta nuestro último aliento, la joya espiritual pertenece únicamente a su dueño, y es un recordatorio omnipresente de nuestra mortalidad. Es el primer refugio de la mente y el último del alma, lo que {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} ansía devorar».
languages.original_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not mere trinkets worn by my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and her hand inexorably reaches for the red crystal on her breast.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul, which {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} is so eager to devour."

traits.locale_text: «Hablas de algo que no puedes comprender, elantach. Las {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}piedras del alma{/g} no son meros adornos para mi gente. Son mucho más...». {n}Yrliet cierra los ojos y su mano se acerca inexorablemente al cristal rojo de su pecho.{/n} «Desde que nacemos hasta nuestro último aliento, la joya espiritual pertenece únicamente a su dueño, y es un recordatorio omnipresente de nuestra mortalidad. Es el primer refugio de la mente y el último del alma, lo que {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} ansía devorar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、お前は自分自身が理解できないことを話しているのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}方位石{/g}は我が民が身につける単なる装身具ではない。もっと偉大なものだ…」{n}ユリエットは目を閉じ、その手は無意識に胸の赤いクリスタルに伸びる。{/n}「魂縛石は生まれてから息を引き取るまで持ち主のものであり、我らが死すべき存在であることを常に思い出させてくれるものだ。それは心の最初の避難所であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}セランスレッシュ{/g}が食らわんと切望する魂の最後の避難所であるのだ」
languages.original_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not mere trinkets worn by my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and her hand inexorably reaches for the red crystal on her breast.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul, which {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} is so eager to devour."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、お前は自分自身が理解できないことを話しているのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}方位石{/g}は我が民が身につける単なる装身具ではない。もっと偉大なものだ…」{n}ユリエットは目を閉じ、その手は無意識に胸の赤いクリスタルに伸びる。{/n}「魂縛石は生まれてから息を引き取るまで持ち主のものであり、我らが死すべき存在であることを常に思い出させてくれるものだ。それは心の最初の避難所であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}セランスレッシュ{/g}が食らわんと切望する魂の最後の避難所であるのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht von etwas, was Ihr nicht verstehen könnt, Elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Wegsteine{/g} sind kein bloßer Tand, den mein Volk trägt, kein Zierschmuck. Sie sind etwas Größeres ..." {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen und ihre Hand greift unweigerlich nach dem roten Kristall an ihrer Brust.{/n} "Von der Geburt bis zum letzten Atemzug gehört der Seelenstein allein seinem Eigentümer und dient als ewige Erinnerung an unsere Sterblichkeit. Denn er ist die erste Zuflucht des Verstandes und die letzte Zuflucht der Seele, die {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} so erpicht ist zu verschlingen."
languages.original_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not mere trinkets worn by my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and her hand inexorably reaches for the red crystal on her breast.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul, which {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} is so eager to devour."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht von etwas, was Ihr nicht verstehen könnt, Elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Wegsteine{/g} sind kein bloßer Tand, den mein Volk trägt, kein Zierschmuck. Sie sind etwas Größeres ..." {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen und ihre Hand greift unweigerlich nach dem roten Kristall an ihrer Brust.{/n} "Von der Geburt bis zum letzten Atemzug gehört der Seelenstein allein seinem Eigentümer und dient als ewige Erinnerung an unsere Sterblichkeit. Denn er ist die erste Zuflucht des Verstandes und die letzte Zuflucht der Seele, die {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} so erpicht ist zu verschlingen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous parlez d'une chose qui dépasse votre entendement, elantach. Les {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}pierres gardiennes{/g} ne sont pas de simples babioles portées par mon peuple, elles jouent un rôle bien plus important.. » {n}Yrliet ferme les yeux et pose une main sur le cristal rouge incrusté dans son plastron.{/n} « Chaque pierre-esprit accompagne son propriétaire de sa naissance jusqu'à son dernier souffle et ne peut appartenir à personne d'autre. Elle nous rappelle constamment notre mortalité, car c'est le premier refuge de l'esprit et l'ultime refuge de l'âme, que {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} rêve de dévorer. »
languages.original_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not mere trinkets worn by my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and her hand inexorably reaches for the red crystal on her breast.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul, which {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} is so eager to devour."

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez d'une chose qui dépasse votre entendement, elantach. Les {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}pierres gardiennes{/g} ne sont pas de simples babioles portées par mon peuple, elles jouent un rôle bien plus important.. » {n}Yrliet ferme les yeux et pose une main sur le cristal rouge incrusté dans son plastron.{/n} « Chaque pierre-esprit accompagne son propriétaire de sa naissance jusqu'à son dernier souffle et ne peut appartenir à personne d'autre. Elle nous rappelle constamment notre mortalité, car c'est le premier refuge de l'esprit et l'ultime refuge de l'âme, que {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} rêve de dévorer. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Kavrayamayacağın şeylerden bahsediyorsun elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Yol taşları{/g}, halkımın takıp takıştırdığı süs eşyaları değildir. Çok daha büyük bir amaca hizmet ederler..." {n}Yrliet gözlerini kapatıyor, eli doğruca göğsündeki kızıl kristale uzanıyor.{/n} "Ruh taşı, doğduğu andan son nefesini verene dek sahibine aittir ve ona her daim fâni olduğunu hatırlatır. Çünkü bu taş; zihnin ilk, ruhun son sığınağıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh'in{/g} bir çırpıda tüketmeye pek hevesli olduğu şey, tam olarak budur."
languages.original_text: "You are talking about something you cannot comprehend, elantach. {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Waystones{/g} are not mere trinkets worn by my people. They are something greater..." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes and her hand inexorably reaches for the red crystal on her breast.{/n} "From birth and to the last breath the spirit stone belongs only to its owner, serving as an ever-present reminder that we are mortal. For it is the first refuge of the mind and the last refuge of the soul, which {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} is so eager to devour."

traits.locale_text: "Kavrayamayacağın bir şeyden bahsediyorsun elantach." {g|Encyclopedia:SpiritStone}Yol taşları{/g}, halkımın takıp takıştırdığı süs eşyaları değildir. Çok daha büyük bir amaca hizmet eder..." {n}Yrliet gözlerini kapatıyor, eli doğruca göğsündeki kızıl kristale uzanıyor.{/n} "Ruh taşı, doğduğu andan son nefesini verene dek sahibine aittir ve ona her daim fâni olduğunu hatırlatır. Çünkü bu taş, zihnin ilk ve ruhun son sığınağıdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}'in de bir çırpıda tüketmeye pek hevesli olduğu şey, tam olarak budur."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
